Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides voluntary work experience opportunities for the long-term unemployed experiencing barriers to the labour market. This includes people with mental health problems, disabilies or otherwise disadvantaged people. Work placements can be for up to a year and ensure that people leave with a current career history and references. Personal development planning enables people to keep moving forward and to improve their prospects of employment. Runs Smart Venue, a coffee shop on London Road offering fair trade coffee. Part of a national organisation established in 1994. Self or any referral.
